p.b: This is a container type Window

html.p:
You can :
- Move it by moving the window title bar
- Resize it by moving the bottom corner on the right side
- Display a context menu by right-clicking on the title bar
- Pop-out or Maximize it in the context menu
- Remove the close button of title bar by using "closable='false'" in XML
- Add "modal='true'" in XML to make window become modal
If your Profiling module is on, you can save the window position. Open the context menu by clicking on the mouse right button and you will see the persitence features.
